titleStmt.title: The apologie of Thomas Bushell, of Enston in the county of Oxford, Esquire. By way of vindication from the supposed treason, or misprision of treason laid to his charge, or suggested against him by malicious persons aiming at his life and fortune; together with the reasons of his absence, and right of his demands ...
titleStmt.author: Bushell, Thomas, 1594-1674.
